itunes:title: Episode 079: Abigail Brand (feat. Al Ewing)
title: Episode 079: Abigail Brand (feat. Al Ewing)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 79 of CEREBRO, Connor and contemporary comics legend Al Ewing (X-Men Red, S.W.O.R.D., Immortal Hulk) survey the schemes of Abigail Brand! The mysterious director of S.W.O.R.D., charged with protecting Earth from extraterrestrial threats, half-alien and half-mutant Brand has always been a prickly ally to the X-Men at best. Now she has secretly betrayed mutantkind entirely, becoming one of the leaders of Orchis.

The CEREBRO character file on Brand begins at 1:31:00.

(Content Advisory: Abigail's story includes war crimes, torture, and war crimes involving torture.)

Thanks to ComiXology for sponsoring the pod! You can sign up for a free trial here.



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
